entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Saint-Quentin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:43 PM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening then snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023
